name: Ext.layout.SizePolicy
doc:
This class describes how a layout will interact with a component it manages.

There are special instances of this class stored as static properties to avoid object instantiation. All instances of this class should be treated as readonly objects.

members.name: readsHeight
members.doc: Indicates that the height of the component is consumed.

members.name: readsWidth
members.doc: Indicates that the width of the component is consumed.

members.name: setsHeight
members.doc: Indicates that the height of the component will be set (i.e., calculated).

members.name: setsWidth
members.doc: Indicates that the width of the component will be set (i.e., calculated).

short_doc: This class describes how a layout will interact with a component it manages. ...
